description.title: Gateway - two registered users with a single subscription (subscribe all logs)
description.purpose: In the test we have a user that deploys and transacts against the Storage contract through the primary wallet extension. A shared wallet extension is created with two registered users, and a single subscription is made to all event logs from the network. Since the Storage Store event is a lifecycle event, and we subscribe to all event logs from the network, we expect a single call back for our subscriber (de-duplication).
